snippet: A British judge on Monday ordered supporters of Julian Assange, the WikiLeaks founder, to pay thousands of dollars they promised for his bail because he violated the conditions for his release.
lead_paragraph: A British judge on Monday ordered supporters of Julian Assange, the WikiLeaks founder, to pay thousands of dollars they promised for his bail because he violated the conditions for his release.

headline.main: Britain: Assange’s Supporters Ordered to Pay
headline.print_headline: Britain: Assange’s Supporters Ordered to Pay
